name: Maimai Green
summary:
Maimai is an arcade rhythm game developed and distributed by Sega, in which the player interacts with objects on a touchscreen and executes dance-like movements. The game supports both single-player and multiplayer gameplay with up to 4 players.

This is the second installment in the maimai franchise. Eco-friendly and developed/distributed by Japanese game company Sega . washing machine Rhythm game for arcade The second work of the maimai series .

It was released on May 24, 2013. The coloring of this work is light green on a white background. On July 11, 2013, it was automatically upgraded to the existing maimai machine through an online update method.

Changes:
- The difficulty of the song has been expanded to 12 levels. As a result, a number of difficulty changes were made.
- ANIME/GAME The genre was divided into ANIME and GAME.
- Among the new songs, Touhou Project and VOCALOID song Last Note. and DECO*27 songs were added.
- Brake judgment has been refined. In the unmanned version, it was 2500 points for PERFECT and 1500 points for GREAT, but from GreeN, even in PERFECT, it is divided into 2600 points within 1 frame, 2550 points within 2 frames, and 2500 points within 3 frames. This also means 2000/1500/1250 points for GREAT judgment. , GOOD judgment is also divided into 1000 points.
- Starting with this game, an achievement rate system has been added. All notes are expressed as a percentage compared to the score obtained when the PERFECT judgment and BREAK score were 2500. In other words, it is possible to achieve an achievement rate higher than 100% by hitting BREAK within 2 frames.
- The speed can now be set from the existing 1/2/3/4/5/6 to 1/2/3/4/5/6/7/8/9.

New Features:
Maimile
- In-game currency feature. Frames, nameplates and music are available for purchase.

Rating
- A system that is a criterion for skill. It is similar to the utility of the Jubit series .
